title: The Unlucky country
creator_contributor_role: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Vietnam War, 1961-1975 - Australia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Medical assistance - Developing countries
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Economic assistance, Australian - Asia, Southeastern
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Vietnam - Social Conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Vietnam - Economic conditions
description: South Vietnam, a developing country facing the process of improving standards of living, health and education, against a background of constant dissension and war - the dual objectives to win a war and develop a country. Discusses the role of Australian Task Forces in establishing security and providing aid for civil development. Shows the work of the three medical teams.
